info.title: Autoservis API
info.description: API for managing user login, logout, info

400.description: Bad request - Missing or invalid input

get.description: Returns the authenticated user current roledata

post.description: Sets role to user and returns roledata

get.description: Returns the authenticated user available roledata

post.description: Saves and seturns new user's data

put.description: Updates a user's data. If the authenticated user updates their own data, the response contains a new JWT access token. If the user updates another user's data, the response contains the updated user object.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

200.description: Successful response: If the user updates themselves, a new access token is returned.

201.description: Successful response: If the user updates another user, the updated user object is returned.

patch.summary: Save a part of a user
patch.description: Saves a part of user's data

get.summary: Get a list of all vehicles by optional user
get.description: Returns a list of vehicles with applied changes. Filtered by user parameter, or by logged user

get.summary: Data of existing vehicle by vehicle_id

delete.summary: Deleting (archiving) of existing vehicle by vehicle_id

patch.summary: Patching of existing vehicle by vehicle_id

overallLengthWidthHeightMm.description: Celková délka, šířka a výška v mm

vehicleNoiseLevelDbaIdleRpm.description: Hluk vozidla v dBA při stojícím motoru (ot/min)

VehicleShort.title: VehicleShort
VehicleShort.description: Schema of vehicle in shortened version
